column5: Hi there. What is the price of gas in Canada? Will be heading up thru Niagara Falls, toronto, north bay, and points north. What is the conversion factor or method for comparing prices to US prices? thanks and best wishes

Hi there. What is the price of gas in Canada? Will be heading up thru Niagara Falls, toronto, north bay, and points north. What is the conversion factor or method for comparing prices to US prices? thanks and best wishes

Unleaded gas was 1.19 per liter the first of August which works out to 4.66 give or take per gallon after you factor in the 9% greater value of the U.S. dollar. It is probably lower now but still well over 3.75 per gallon after the conversion math is done. They tax it hard to finance all the socialist programs up there.
Gas price is 89 cents per litre as of today
